text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly mentions the mechanism for ensuring EU law is applied consistently across member states by advising the user to seek a national judicial remedy which can then 'Ask for a *preliminary ruling* from the Luxembourg courts to the Court of Justice of the EU (CJEU). The national court can refer the question \u201cDoes this Luxembourg amendment contravene the GDPR?\u201d to the CJEU under Article 267 TFEU.'
